modules.description: This module implements client-side network communication with support for protocol upgrades and clean shutdowns. It works with Eio's network streams and switch primitives to manage asynchronous connections. Concrete use cases include establishing and managing upgraded WebSocket connections over HTTP or other layered protocols.

Handles incoming network connections for HTTP servers using the Eio concurrency library. It provides functions to create connection handlers for both standard and upgradable protocols (like HTTP/1.1 and WebSocket), processing requests with a specified runtime and buffer size. These handlers manage communication over stream sockets, routing requests to user-defined request handlers based on the client's address.

This module provides functions for building HTTP servers and clients with support for protocol upgrades like WebSocket, handling network communication over stream sockets using Eio's concurrency primitives. It works with stream sockets, network addresses, and Eio switches to manage asynchronous connections and request routing. Concrete use cases include implementing HTTP/1.1 servers with per-client request handling and establishing upgraded WebSocket connections from clients.
